title: Keralan pumpkin curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '1/4 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon ginger and garlic paste', '2 fresh green chillies, sliced (or to taste)', '5 to 6 fresh curry leaves', '2 onions, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '300g peeled and cubed pumpkin', 'salt to taste', '350ml water', '1 teaspoon tamarind paste']
